        course - of the session
        tutor - that teaches the session
        student - list of students that are taking this session
        room - of the session
        duration - of the session in min
        year - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        monthOfYear - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        dayOfMonth - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        hour - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        minutes - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        Returns:
        newly created session

      • createSession

        @Transactional
public ca.mcgill.ecse321.backend.model.Session createSession(ca.mcgill.ecse321.backend.model.Course course,
                                                                             ca.mcgill.ecse321.backend.model.Tutor tutor,

                                                                             int dayOfMonth,
                                                                             int hour,
                                                                             int minutes)
        create a new session
        Parameters:
        course - of the session
        tutor - of the session
        student - that wants the session
        duration - of the session in min
        year - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        monthOfYear - of the session (if -1, uses current)
        dayOfMonth - of the session (if -1, uses current)
